To determine the inhibitory effect of soluble heparin on EV-A71 variants, a virus inactivation assay was performed as previously described [ 9]. In brief, viruses were incubated with 2.5 mg/ml of soluble heparin (Sigma, USA) for an hour at 37°C. The treated viruses were inoculated onto pre-seeded RD cells and incubated at 37°C. Two days later, the cell viability of each infected virus variants was measured using CellTiter 96 Aqueous One solution Cell Proliferation Assay (Promega, USA).
